channel.title: PerfectlySoft JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [ISS-15] Infinite loop when calling connect()
item.description:
When using the MySQL connector, PerfectServer goes into an infinite loop when attempting to call the connect() method.

Back trace:

    etc…

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
